import React, { useContext } from 'react' import {proContext} from "./Context" export default function Product(props) { const {id,name,price,proImage} = props.data const{cartItem,AddProduct,RemoveProduct}=useContext(proContext) console.log(cartItem) return (

产品名称：{name}

人民币：{price}元

) }
